article_title: It's just a bill on Capitol hill in Pierre -- until the governor signs it

article_metadata.description: As governor of South Dakota, Dennis Daugaard has both the pleasure and the responsibility of being the final word on which new laws are enacted in our state.
article_metadata.author:
Bart Pfankuch
Journal staff
